list_definition.definition: a kind of deep red precious stone

list_ex_of_english: She has eyes of shining emeralds and ruby red plump lips.

It has 3, lavender ruffled-edge blossoms, edged in an attractive deeper ruby, and often grow on single stems as well as in clusters.
